content.rendered:
Dragon Ball Super is the sequel to the Dragon Ball Z manga and anime series. The story takes place after the defeat of Buu and the latest two Dragon Ball Z movies, as well as between the ten-year time jump and the 28th Martial Arts Grand Tournament. Son Goku and his friends encounter new enemies who are much stronger than they have seen so far, so they must attain divine power. Goku defends Earth from various hostile deities and then travels to other universes where he also matches special creatures.

Number of seasons: 1 (2015-2018)

Status: Finished

Creator: Akira Toriyama

Channel: Fuji TV

Starring: Masako Nozawa, Naoki Tatsuta, Ryô Horikawa
